data.title: Careers at IAG GBS
data.meta_description: Careers at IAG GBS. Find Great Talent with Career Pages. | powered by SmartRecruiters | Find Great Talent with a Career Page.
data.text:
IAG GBS is part of International Airlines Group (IAG), one of the worldâ€™s leading airline groups and owner of some of the biggest brands in the sky.

With a diverse workforce spread across four countries, IAG GBS creates and develops innovative solutions to drive sustainable transformation by delivering finance, procurement and some airline services, as well as group-wide systems, across IAG. Each Group operating company benefits from our centralised model, driving efficiencies, automation and economies of scale.
